front.title: A central policy controlling based PMIPv6 Solutions

abstract.t: This document defines a central policy controlling network-basedmobility management solution through Authentication, Authorization,Accounting (AAA), and policy controller interactions between ProxyMobile IPv6 entities(both Mobile Access Gateway and Local MobilityAnchor) under an AAA server and policy server group within a ProxyMobile IPv6 Domain. The AAA and policy interactions are not only usedto download and update mobile node specific user data informationbetween Proxy Mobile IPv6 entities and a remote policy store, butalso update the local mobility anchor about the current location ofthe mobile node instead of signaling messages between the mobileaccess gateway and local mobility anchor.
